title: (x) "Kameme" compact sans w/ bouncing baseline - Placard {Yves}
content:
Hi everyone.  
I would be glad if someone told me the name of this font.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202035035im_/http:/typophile.com/files/kamemee_5191.jpg)
  
Thanks
author: powlpowl

comments.content: This is [Placard Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202035035/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/monotype/placard_std_virtual/), but you'll have to custom-bounce your baseline I'm afraid. ;^)
